Name: Scarlet Smiling Skull
About the game: What will you do if you see someone that you admire die in front of you? Will you go look for the truth? Can you handle the truth?! Scarlet Smiling Skull is a unique visual novel with stylized visual, relate-able topics, and meaningful choices!
